name: Coin Rescue Mission
description:
Coin Rescue Mission is a Virtual Reality game when you can help to release some coins from the piggy banks where they are caught!

You can dive into each piggy bank  that contains a bunch of puzzles that you have to solve to release the coin

When you open up a piggy bank, theres a "zoom" effect that allows us to interact with the whole space and puzzles inside the bank

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game prototype was made for the  2019 Unreal  Engine Spring  #ue4jam

As I ran out of time, only one level(piggy bank) is completed

I used these assets from the marketplace

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/hq-residential-house

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/mega-game-music-collection

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/handy-hands-pack-vr-hands-megapack

For the interactions, I used the vr expansion plugins

https://forums.unrealengine.com/development-discussion/vr-ar-development/89050-vr-expansion-plugin

Also, the bank models are based on :

Gumball Machine (Free Download) - Download Free 3D model by pizzaguyty (@pizzaguyty) - Sketchfab

https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/pig-piggy-bank-max-free/1033640
